FuncDef: The display damp-interface brief command displays suppression status of a flapping physical interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the suppression status of a flapping interface, run the display damp-interface brief command. The command output facilitates status monitoring and fault diagnosis. The command output provides a basis for statistics collection and interface troubleshooting.
Precautions
If status flapping suppression is configured globally, the display damp-interface brief command output displays the suppression status and relevant statistics of all physical interfaces that do not have the damp-interface ignore-global command configuration. The physical interfaces include the Ethernet interfaces.
If the damp-interface enable command is not run in the global view, the display damp-interface and display damp-interface brief command display the suppression status and statistics of a flapping interface that is suppressed.
